title: (6000-268) Castelo Branco - 27 Rua Professor Vieira de Almeida
title_short: (6000-268) Castelo Branco - 27 Rua Professor Vieira de Almeida

title: (6000-267) Castelo Branco - Lote 5 Rua Professor Doutor Faria de Vasconcelos
title_short: (6000-267) Castelo Branco - Lote 5 Rua Professor Doutor Faria de Vasconcelos

title: (6000-257) Castelo Branco - 9 Quelha do Barrocal
description: Relatively close to combo station and large car park. Flat on flat ground Passou-se bem a noite e não se ouviram comboios. Passage of some cars that is perfectly tolerable.

title: (6000-257) Castelo Branco - 3 Rua Pedro da Fonseca
title_short: (6000-257) Castelo Branco - 3 Rua Pedro da Fonseca
description: Very quiet parking between blocks of flats. There is a nearby bar where you can eat and it is close to the center. We have had a very quiet night. The negative part is that there is no shade.

title: (6000-212) Castelo Branco - 26 Rua Doutor Francisco Robalo Guedes
title_short: (6000-212) Castelo Branco - 26 Rua Doutor Francisco Robalo Guedes
description: Quiet and peaceful place. the historic center about 4 kms. You can go walking. good steakhouses to eat. just park or spend the night Only to park or spend the night and visit the city Quiet site on the outskirts of Castelo Branco. It is a car park next to apartment blocks. Very quiet to sleep. Historic center 20 minutes walk

title: (6000-246) Castelo Branco - 32 Rua Maria Martins
description: Park up at side of road . truckers use this also lots of bays even for very large motorhomes . park nearby across road .

title: (6000) Castelo Branco - 21 Rua Amilcar Crespo
description: New (2023-05) full free service and motorhome area aside EN18 road, not very leveled and without shadows but aside green park (“Parque Urbano Cruz do Montalvão”) and shopping (also car wash machine), quiet enough at night besides street nearby.

title: (6000) Castelo Branco - Avenida do Empresário
description: Big parking area of the local football- stadium and swimming pool. Lots of places, partially under trees (limited heights), no issue regarding size of Campervan. No signs stating that parking of campervans is forbidden. Attention: the area is only in few places flat, the main part has a slight inclination, so you may need to level your campervan. No services, just parking. Not close to the city, so if you go there and then comment that's not close to the city, then you should better learn how to read maps.

title: (6000-146) Castelo Branco - 10 Rua Dona Emília Oliveira Pinto
title_short: (6000-146) Castelo Branco - 10 Rua Dona Emília Oliveira Pinto
description: Good parking, quiet.

title: (6000-154) Castelo Branco - 96 Rua Arrabalde dos Açougues
title_short: (6000-154) Castelo Branco - 96 Rua Arrabalde dos Açougues
description: Bon parking day, nit, tranquil and tarmac. 500 meters from the cathedral and the episcopal garden, center of the city, passant per la rua de Fonte Nova.

title: (6000) Castelo Branco - N3
description: Auchan parking.no service. it seemed safer than the one at 1 km with paid water supply which is more isolated.

title: (6000-459) Castelo Branco - Rua G
description: Emptying and filling service area (only 2€ coins) as well as P in the Intermarche supermarket car park. There’s also a laundry service and a car repair station and store. Besides of the market and the Gas station all inside the park.

name: Parque de Campismo Municipal de Castelo Branco
title: (6000) Parque de Campismo Municipal de Castelo Branco
title_short: (6000) Parque de Campismo Municipal de Castelo Branco
description: Very quiet municipal campsite. Well maintained

title: (6000) Castelo Branco - N233
description: Repsol tank station. Easy accses for larg Rv

title: (6000) Castelo Branco - Unnamed Road
description: Cozy car park.

title: (6000) Castelo Branco -
description: The perfect place in nature to spend the night if you go to Portugal. Close to the road but next to a pond and between paths and woods. At night you hear a lot of frogs. Before arriving at the site there is also the option to park in a paved parking lot of a sports center.

title: (6000) Castelo Branco - IP2
description: Rest station with a new installation of waste and water, to AutoVan’s and motorhomes, you can sleep up to 72hour all services are free. I think they have installation of shower but did not check. I think they have internet if you ask. GPS fuel and Gas in can sold here. Has a little supermarket, and a coffee shop. Good for one night or just refuel gas, diesel, water or other. There is no sign to the caravan place but it’s near the truck area. I will come back and put fotos.

title: (6000) Castelo Branco - E806
description: Rest Area in Highway A23, big park with pic-nic area. With supermarket and fuel station.

title: (6000) - N233
description: Several hard-packed parking lots, river beach and barbecues under olive trees.

name: Quinta de Volta a Fonte
title: (6000-030) Quinta de Volta a Fonte
description:
Ola! Welcome to my beautiful place in the middle of nature. Where crickets and frogs and birds make their voices heard. My name is Annemieke and I bought this land in May 2023 to start a self-sustaining off-grid life, in the middle of Portuguese nature. On the land there are olive trees, cork trees, lots of lavender, broom, a variety of flowers and plants, enjoy it! Now, in July 2023, I am in the initial phase of building all of this. The lovely shower and toilet are available, and we will soon start construction of the indoor and outdoor kitchen. There is already a temporary outdoor kitchen, minimal, but workable. You can cook and wash dishes there. Even though the facilities are not yet completely complete, camping is already enjoyable for people who are self-sufficient.

About 10 minutes from my quinta is the beautiful Lake Maratekka, where you can cool off and swim, canoe and fish.

A 2-minute drive from here is a natural fountain, for wonderfully fresh spring water to fill your tank. Just an 8 minute drive away is the Intermarché with a place to throw away the gray water.

I can guarantee that you can completely relax here. Whether you want to be on your own or are looking for some fun, you can be who you are here. The atmosphere is open and cozy, you can relax in nature and there is plenty to do in the area. The mountains are an hour's drive away, where you can take beautiful walks.

Castelo Branco is less than fifteen minutes away, with nice restaurants and cafes, and supermarkets

My country is still a kind of blank canvas. I have a lot of great ideas, but I also really enjoy hearing other people's ideas. I have a few cozy seating areas with a view, but I still want to make pergolas (with natural foliage), plant fruit trees, make a pond, create a vegetable garden, cozy spots, domes, all kinds of things.

If you would like to camp in nature, then come and visit us, we would like to welcome you! Sometimes Google Maps wants to send you down a dead end, don't do this. Then drive a little further towards Cafede. At the intersection of the road you have to drive to my hatchery, there is a very large Agave plant. If you see it, you can take that road, then drive all the way to the end, the road will automatically lead you to the right place. See you soon!

name: The Rock Plateau
title: (6000) The Rock Plateau
description: MESSAGE Before! The Rock Plateau offers all camping and van life facilities, Stylish Rooms available, also campervans and glamping tents. there are great hot showers, toilets an activity centre, archery, basketball, pool table, pool, tennis and regular events ect. there is a laundry service -'the Sock Plateau' and food/drink is also offered. picnic tables, sun loungers, hammocks, teepees, Bar and Kitchen. various weekly events (movie nights, quiz nights ect) Totally Donation/contribution based. CALL Before. FOLLOW RED SIGNS FROM THIS POINT.

title: (6000-451) Lentiscais - Cais fluvial de Lentiscais
description: Nice "secret" flat free P surrounded by nature, on left Ponsul riverside that here is a lake, where you can swim with care. Next to river harbor for touristic Tejo cruisers. Some people leave their feces around the parking, but the river and shores are clean and awesome. NOTE: Be careful of piking rocks near the shore when swimming! They stick out even upto 5 m from the shore without anything around but water just below the surface.

title: (6000) Cebolais de Cima - 33 Rua Benemérito João Salavessa
title_short: (6000) Cebolais de Cima - 33 Rua Benemérito João Salavessa
description: Very quite place to sleep, very quite village with nice people, near Christian Motorcyclists Association, when opened they offer free amenities. Leveled.

title: (6000-451) Castelo Branco - N18-8
description: Drinking water source accessible by the roadside!

title: (6005) Alcains - Estr. de Santa Apolonia
description: Municipal piscina parking area.  flat level parking, lots of space, helpful staff at the pool. this is an out for pool so will only be open in the summer months. there is a good bar serving food and drink. Very quiet night, good access for all size vans.

title: (6005-150) - 5 Avenida da Liberdade
description: Picnic area with children's play area and water source. None of the tables were in the shade at lunchtime. Very quiet area.

title: (6005-010) Alcains - 44 Estrada de São Domingos
description: Laundromat in Intermarché store. Easy parking.

title: (6005) Alcains - 77 Rua Sanches Semedo
description: Parking for town centre . shops cafes etc children’s play area

title: (6005) Castelo Branco - 2000 Quinta Malcata
description:
Large site with great parking, tables and play area for children. beside a small river. quiet, well-lighted at night.

update March 2019: This is locked so can't get in at 6:30pm, looks like a private school carpark.

title: (6030-116) Sarnadas Rodão - AR IP2
description: Place to park day and night

name: Free Living Resort
title: (6000) Free Living Resort
description: ---Important information--- Summer break from 19.07 - 15.09.2022 Free Living Resort - the place where traveling families are welcome. With us, traveling families will find a motorhome parking space between olive and fig trees, in harmony with nature. The emphasis is on the freedom of parents and children. We attach great importance to a natural environment. Therefore we cannot offer a disposal station. We ask our guests to empty their gray and black water before coming to us. A free option is the Intermarché in the industrial area of Castelo Branco. You can also do your laundry there. You are welcome to hang up your laundry with us. 5 minutes from us, at the entrance to Salgueiro do Campo, there is a source of drinking water on the left. Inquiries are welcome via email or Instagram. A donation-based expense allowance of 5 euros per night and parking space is desirable. Our little paradise is located near Castelo Branco, Portugal, on the outskirts of the beautiful town of Freixial do Campo.

title: (6000) Povoa de Rio Moinhos - Unnamed Road
title_short: (6000) Povoa de Rio Moinhos - Unnamed Road
description: Nice quiet place near the lake. village within walking distance.

title: (6030) - Represa do Retaxo
description: Small reservoir (named “Represa do Retaxo”) for fishermen, with picnic tables and a barbecue area. Absolutely quiet and clean, to admire the otters. Smooth dirt road 200 m from the small street and 2 km from the nearest village = Retaxo. Several impalements to park. No service, only garbage cans. Reception 4G.

name: Fair Life Ranch
title: (6005) Fair Life Ranch
description:
Be welcome with us at our Fair Life Ranch! In January 2023 we moved from the Netherlands to Portugal with our animals. Since then we have been building and creating. Not all facilities are there yet, but for people who want to camp primitively or are self-sufficient, it is already nice to stay here. We have two furnished tents for rent and enough space for our own tents/caravans/campers. The permanent places are still in the making so it's still creative parking. Please note that the roads to our farm are dusty and bumpy. For campers and caravans longer than 8 meters we do not (yet) have a suitable driveway and therefore no suitable parking options. With the presence of our horses, pigs, sheep, dogs, cats, chickens, ducks, rabbits and guinea pigs, it is never boring here and there is always something to do! Before your stay, please contact us to inquire whether there is room and to indicate the time of arrival. Our farm is best reached by driving to the following coordinates: (39.9046998, -7.3552250)
(39.9030429, -7.3614571)
(39.8957913, -7.3620619)
(39.8954978, -7.3708101)
(39.8970941, -7.3722060) Kind regards, Ilona & Sophie

address.street: Rua do Centro de Dia BCCI No 373

name: Camp Calma
title: (6000) Camp Calma
description:
? Nature's Retreat:
Imagine a haven nestled in the heart of Tinalhas, Portugal. Drive in with your campervan or pitch your own tent, creating a personal sanctuary amidst the great outdoors.

? Modern Comforts:
At "Camp Calma," you're not far from the conveniences of the modern world. High-speed internet and a soothing warm water shower are ready to enhance your stay.

? Vanlife Vibes:
Your host, Daniel, is a fellow Vanlife enthusiast. Having embraced the off-grid lifestyle, he understands the deep connection between freedom, nature, and the soul. His journey has inspired this tranquil space, ensuring that your stay is a beautiful blend of adventure and peace.

? Refresh & Rejuvenate:
As the day winds down, let the pool's cool embrace refresh your spirit.

? Support the Dream:
For just 15 Euros, you can enjoy 24 hours in this serene environment. Your contribution helps maintain and nurture this beautiful campsite.

? Get in touch:
To book your stay or for inquiries, reach out to Daniel via WhatsApp or Telegram 

? Welcome:
To your off-grid dream.

title: (6005) Alcains -
description: Small gravel road leads from the main road directly to the lake.

title: (6000) - Unnamed Road
description: Prohibition to stay overnight.

title: (6000) - EM546
description: New motorhome, next to pool and picnic area. Space for 5 mobile homes. The parking lot is divided for 15 cars and a maximum of 5 mobile homes. 1 EHU power socket at the tap. Potable water, Grey and Black waste available. The toilet is only open when the outdoor pool is open in season.

title: (10513) Cedillo - EX-375
description:
Great place to spend a few days enjoying the area with all the great walks. Hard ground. Off the main road. Park near the trees and you will not be seen from what little traffic there is which ends at the dam and has no access to Portugal.
.

title: (6005-232) Lousa -
description: Nice level parking lot next to a small chapel and between cork trees. We just took a break. Also good for overnight stays.

name: Embalse de Cedillo
title: (10513) Embalse de Cedillo
description: Parking next to the dam. No service, but a very friendly security guard. He came over and told us it was OK to spend the night there.

title: (6005) Lardosa - Unnamed Road
description: Private motorhome area located near the highway, near the Marateca dam.  Magnificent view of the Serra da Gardunha.  Possibility to rent all-terrain electric scooters.

title: (10513) Cedillo - EX-375
description: Small picnic area under an impressive cork oak. Shadow under it, fits the vehicle. Near the town of Cedillo. There is a bench table to eat and litter bins.

title: (6000) - Rua do Lagar
description: Small level gravel car park, on the edge of a road with little traffic and on the outskirts of the village. No service, optimal satellite reception but 4G almost nonexistent or yres perfectible. The place is not rural but can be useful for one night.

title: (6000) Cabeca Gorda - 28 Rua Principal
description: Fountain with drinking water

title: (6000) Sobral do Campo -
description: Place completely in nature surrounded by olive trees. friendly and family location completely closed inside the property

title: (6060) Ladoeiro - 6 Rua da Escola
description: Good place next to the municipal swimming pool very quiet place.

title: (10512) Herrera de Alcántara -
description: Pier in perfect condition currently unused

title: (6005) Lousa -
description: Big park to sleep or eat, best to the road but at night no cars. Has a restaurant near, a fuel station and they sell fresh fruit from the area. Good for one night or a rest of a few hours.

name: Espaço campismo fora da rede
title: (6000-713) Espaço campismo fora da rede
description: Close to nature, between two small villages, some parking and tent sites (more or less easily accessible) await you on a private property by the river. Available: equipped open-air kitchen, drinking water, dining area and washing-up facilities, dry toilet, unheated shower, cell phone/laptop charging station, waste separation, access to the river. * Donation-based stays to improve services and maintenance * Depending on the season and our mood, we organize campfires, musical evenings, barbecues, pizzas, etc. and offer delicious meals (also vegan, vegetarian...) on request. The area invites you to beautiful mountain bike tours, hikes or yoga, a river beach to cool off is 1.5 km away, the nearest shops can be reached in 10 minutes by car. We offer additional services based on availability: DIY and workshop for repair and conversion of vehicles with or without technical assistance, bike maintenance, guided tours, shopping... Pets are allowed under certain conditions. A dominant female husky lives on the property and is very sociable with children and adults, but not with some of her own kind. We are happy to welcome you in several languages: English, French, German, Portuguese. :)

title: (6000) Porto da Vila - Unnamed road
description:
Parking at the local church. Very quiet and peaceful place. 
Don't let Google lure you through the village, very narrow! Follow the signs for 'campo de jogos' to get around the village.

title: (6030) Vila Velha de Ródão - Unnamed Road
title_short: (6030) Vila Velha de Ródão - Unnamed Road
description: Close to the Penedo Gordo Viewpoint.  Going up to the lookout post we have a 360° paradisiacal view.  Vila Velha de Ródão is at our feet as is the Tejo river.  We stayed 1 night without any problems. 4G at maximum level. Don't forget to collect your trash and also the distracted ones. Enjoy

title: (6030-217) Vila Velha de Rodão - 210 Rua do Cabeço do Salvador
title_short: (6030-217) Vila Velha de Rodão - 210 Rua do Cabeço do Salvador
description: Carpark with a view of river . next to a bar and children’s play area . there’s also a gym here but i didn’t use it . short walk to river and town (it is the market place area with carpark) we used this side of the river when we tried the official town aire and a ‘festival was there’ so we couldn’t use it

title: (6030) Vila Velha de Ródão -
description: Place on the edge of the small road with a magnificent view! Be careful, the road to get there is narrow, difficult CC access!

title: (6050) Montalvão - EM1139
description: Remote plot of land in the middle of the wild. 2 miles from the small town of Montalvão. Extended views of Portugal and Spain interior landscape, nearby Sever River. Surrounded by a Natural preserved Park. A quiet area perfect for night sky observation. Ideal for tents, camper vans and small motorhomes. The route from the village to the site is dirt road. Please call before arrival. Alan

title: () Vila Velha de Rodão - 167 Rua do Porto do Tejo
title_short: () Vila Velha de Rodão - 167 Rua do Porto do Tejo
description: Place perfect for eating, resting and overnight. Very nice motorhome area, located in a beautiful natural environment (big trees but few places open for satellite) next to the yew, with a pier to visit the river and a restaurant at the foot of the river (about 100m from the area). Free wifi and water intake, emptying of chemical but NOT gray water by the moment (maybe reoperational Summer 2023); P illuminated. You rest well without noise and in the morning with the awakening of the birds. Walk 150m SSE and watch where high Tejo river flow arrived in 1979-Feb-10 (mark at left side) and 150m more to cross pedestrian wooden bridge over Enxarrique and arrive immediately at panels info about men occupation 30 000 years ago (Middle Palaeolithic); watch long metallic bridge over Tejo river when returning (very nice at night!). Small town Vila Velha de Ródão has interesting museum. Camping is closed all year round; its reception is tourist office. External toilets may function on Summertime.

title: (6005) Louriçal do Campo - Estrada da Oles
title_short: (6005) Louriçal do Campo - Estrada da Oles
description: Small place in the middle of nowhere. Great view. Post office, bakery and three coffee shops in the next town about 2 km away.

title: (6030) - Unnamed Road
description: Small picnic area with barbecue on Tejo riverside. Possibility to park. We spent a very quiet night there. Accessible by a small path to vans and small trucks.

title: (6150) Proença-a-Nova -
description: Parking with Dixie toilets and observation tower, some downhill biking, a viaFerrata. I stayed here and left after climbing. Access by gravel roads, sometimes steep, but totally doable with the t3 2WD.

title: (6150) Chão do Galêgo - EM1313
description: Newly constructed in 2022. Quiet spot on edge of small village. Services include toilet, shower (solar heated) and picnic tables. Near via ferrata, paragliding, BTT enduro/mountain bike and hiking trails including hilltop observation tower.

title: (6060) Idanha-A-Nova - Unnamed Road
description: Quiet place on the edge of the picturesque little village of Oledo a few km from Idanha-a -Nova (Small town with all the necessary amenities).

title: (6005) Louriçal do Campo - 28 Rua Presidente Craveiro Lopes
title_short: (6005) Louriçal do Campo - 28 Rua Presidente Craveiro Lopes
description: Nice, shady car park on the edge of the village. There is water and benches. No other facilities. There is a bar in the village and a walk starts. The swimming pool is also open in summer.

title: (6060) Idanha-A-Nova -
description: Perfect place to sleep for one night. Has a summer swimming pool, has a lot a place to park, garbage, termos courts and shade for park in the summer. Free access to park. Good night sleep!

title: (6060-709) Idanha a Nova - 13 Rua Doutor Firmino Crespo
title_short: (6060-709) Idanha a Nova - 13 Rua Doutor Firmino Crespo
description: Between the bus Terminal and the Cultural Center, 200 meters from the city hall, in a residential area, well lit, flat, spacious and very quiet to stay overnight, no problems for large motorhomes. No services, which are at Intermarché, free.

title: (6005) Louriçal do Campo -
description:
Lovely place in the middle of the olive grove between fruit trees and grapes. The Quinta is located at the foot of the Gardunha (Estrela Mountains) and is the starting point of beautiful hiking and mountain biking trails. The Marateca lake, where you can kayak, supboard and swim, is less than 7 minutes away by car. In the picturesque mountain village of Louriçal do Campo you can do your daily shopping in a small supermercado and drink coffee at one of the cafes.
The farm is still under construction, not all facilities are complete yet. The place is especially suitable for off-grid / self-sufficient campers and buses. Residence based on a free gift (or a helping hand).

title: (6060-163) Idanha a Nova - 16 Largo do Município
title_short: (6060-163) Idanha a Nova - 16 Largo do Município
description: A parking in the small city, very calm to sleep, has a free bathroom, 2 ATM 1 Pharmacy and police very near.

title: (6000) Almaceda - 5 Rua da Igreja
description: River swimming pool, parking right next to it. Has many amenities, and delicious to hang during the day and swim.

title: (6060) Idanha a Nova - 14 Largo do Município
title_short: (6060) Idanha a Nova - 14 Largo do Município
description: Flat parking near the hospital. Free, no service except a water faucet

title: (6030) - Unnamed Road
description:
A few hundred meters before the (in the evenings) popular parking lot, you'll find this gem between the rocks. A small even surface next to the hiking trail. If you're a little lucky
, the clouds come in in the morning and you look at a fluffy cloudy surface. Leave it clean, there are toilets next to the castle. Even at night you can listen to the birds singing in the valley.

title: (6030) Vila Velha de Rodão - Vila Velha de Ródão de, Castelo de Ródão (rei Wamba) e capela N. Sra Castelo
title_short: (6030) Vila Velha de Rodão - Vila Velha de Ródão de, Castelo de Ródão (rei Wamba) e capela N. Sra Castelo
description: Location is beautiful (on right side top of Tejo river natural narrow, called Portas de Ródão, 220m just above river) specially during sunset and sunrise. Also good to watch stars! Spent one night here, fine. 1 disadvantage that there is a nasty stench. Small free flat P can be busy during Summertime with cars of tourists that climb till point of view and old tower; if so, wait on previous parking space. NOTE: on summertime and weekends, stop at previous identified place and walk 300m to see if space available, because road is flat but narrow even to cross with cars.

address.street: Vila Velha de Ródão de, Castelo de Ródão (rei Wamba) e capela N. Sra Castelo

title: (6060-101) Idanha a Nova - 187 Rua Doutor Aprígio Melo Leão de Meireles
title_short: (6060-101) Idanha a Nova - 187 Rua Doutor Aprígio Melo Leão de Meireles
description: Stadium car park day and night, paved surface and trees to take advantage of the shade, café restaurant nearby, inter-market 300m away with all washing machine services. Very nice view over the valley.

address.street: 187 Rua Doutor Aprígio Melo Leão de Meireles

title: (6060) Idanha a Nova - Avenida Joaquim Morão
title_short: (6060) Idanha a Nova - Avenida Joaquim Morão
description: Intermarché with gray and black water drain, free water, and washing machine.

title: (10510) Santiago de Alcántara -
description: Picnic area in a very beautiful environment, next to a jetty and source of sulphurous waters. It is reached by a long track but it goes very well, in the final descent there is a sharp turn that with a van very well but with ac I do not know what.

title: (6060-191) Idanha a Nova - 3 N353
description: Two restaurants, a parking area, has a free fountain with water, they sell coal and wood for fire and a little supermarket. Good place to stop!

title: (6230) Atalaia do Campo -
description:
I offer a spot in the countryside for self going campervans or people with tents.

We live an off grid life with 4 neighbouring families and in total 6 kids (age 5 to 8.)


get in touch via phone if you want to come 

0049 1778271703 


A bit about us:
I am Lu (35) with Yuma (6) and since 3 years we live in Portugal.

I am working as a Somatic trauma integration therapist (on and offline) and my passion is all about transformational work on a bodily and spiritual level.

Yuma is my 6 year old son who understands English and Swedish and speaks German.
He loves running and playing around with his friends ans quiet times to play on his own...

name: MaAmLaDa
title: (6230-600) MaAmLaDa
description: We offer a beautiful pitch in the middle of nature. Surrounded by olive trees and absolute tranquility. The pitch is on the edge of our permaculture project, with direct access to the river, campfire site, small grove with a pond. For a small fee you can take a shower in the warm outdoor shower. Our washing machine is also available for a fee. There is no power connection on the pitch, so it is only suitable for self-sufficient campers. Your vehicle should not be longer than 6m and not wider than 2.50m, as the approach leads over a dirt road. The best route is via the “Soalheira” motorway exit, then in the direction of “Estação”, after the level crossing the navigation system will take you here. We look forward to welcoming you to our off-grid retreat.

address.street: Quinta da Malhada Velha, caixa portal 113

title: (6060) Idanha a Nova - 247 N354
description: [PT] Place for picnic, with table and fountain of running water. Large place to stop motorhome.

title: (6060) Idanha a Nova - N354
description: Very close to Idanha a Nova, very nice area with fountain, public lighting, picnic tables, trees, beautiful view.

title: (6050) Pardo - N18
description: Magnificent place with several pitches accessible with a motorhome, for the more adventurous there is a magnificent view of the valley at the end of the trail. We spent a quiet night there and enjoyed a sunny morning

title: (6160) - N238
description: Parking near a relay antenna, after having mounted a stony track in good condition. Access to Via ferrata, hiking and climbing cliff equipped. No service, but clean. Calm assured and pleasant view.

title: (6060) Idanha-A-Nova -
description: Small place in height offering a nice 360° view that can accommodate 1 to 2 vehicles. Avoid large sizes.

title: (6230) Castelo Novo - Rua Castelo do Velho
title_short: (6230) Castelo Novo - Rua Castelo do Velho
description: Large flat car park at the top of Castelo Novo historic village (it belongs to their route). No services except a fountain. Very quiet place to spend the night, ideal to visit this beautiful village and watch the sun rising.

title: (6230) Castelo Novo - 1 Estrada da Santa da Senhora do Convento
title_short: (6230) Castelo Novo - 1 Estrada da Santa da Senhora do Convento
description: Public summer swimming-pool on river. With small park bu near the village. With monuments and caste.

address.street: 1 Estrada da Santa da Senhora do Convento

title: (6060) Idanha-A-Nova -
description: Beautiful place right on the shore of a foothill of the reservoir. We spent a quiet day/night there in the winter. Saw a farmer who greeted us and shepherds and a few fishermen, otherwise we had complete peace. Very clean, please make sure it stays that way! From time to time a bar 4G, otherwise no internet reception..

title: (6060) Idanha-A-Nova - Unnamed Road
description: A place to spend a quiet night. Surrounded by hills and trees, views of the (empty) lake.  At the end of a tarmac road. One small tree brushed our 6m motorhome but apart from that the access is good. Recommended.

title: (6060) Idanha a Nova - Unnamed Road
description: Picnic area at the edge of a lake, swimming possible. Camping not allowed.

title: (6150-214) Peral - 22 Rua da Escola
description: Very peaceful place. Only the sound of owls can be heard. The church bell rings from 7 am to 10 pm.

name: Piscina Municipal de Fratel
title: (6030) Piscina Municipal de Fratel
description: Service area easily accessible from A23 highway (search 150m gravel access direct from N 3 road, km 176,3, instead via village where you should have to bypass swimming pool!) with gravel free space to P and overnight (not illuminated and a bit unleveled). On summertime, open air swimming pool open and corresponding snack and toilets. Swimming pools (outdoor pools) in Portugal are generally only open from middle June to the end of August/September. NOTE: when swimming pool functions, access to service area during daytime may be impossible :-( because cars park under trees.

name: CamperCamping Alpedrinha
title: (6230-063) CamperCamping Alpedrinha
description: Beautiful place in a beautiful natural peaceful setting. Located in the interior of Portugal. They cultivate Aloe Vera barbadensis on the farm. Location fenced. Nice views in different places. Well worth a visit

address.street: Quinta do Ribeira Termas da Touca

title: (6060) Idanha-A-Nova -
description: Beautiful place without services. Super quiet (might get busier on the weekends), amazing lake and perfect for people traveling with dogs. There’s cell service although can be weak depending on the spot. For those enjoying nature and moments it’s perfect.

title: (6060) Idanha-A-Nova -
description: Welcome to the near pre-parking, level 2 of the entrance to the boom festival, after level 1 of the pre-parking, and before the final boss of level 3 of the great and mythical parking lot At so much prized :)

name: MobileCamping
title: (6230-512) MobileCamping
description: From 6230-512 Orca on the N 239 towards Vale de Prazeres, at km 9, turn right then go straight. After about 1 km turn left at the flag. Owner will come by later. 2.5 hectare property with private mobile home parking space (space is still under construction. Plumbing, electricity, etc. only from autumn 2023). Fantastic panoramic view of the Serra da Gardunha. Long walks through beautiful nature. See right nearby. Storks, ducks, wild boar, turtles, nutrias and much more. No street noise. The owner is already looking forward to visitors and a small donation. We speak English, Spanish, German.

title: (6060) Idanha a Nova - Unnamed Road
description: Parking next to the reservoir. Perfect for spending the day. Very calm

name: Camping Municipal d'Idanha-a-Nova
title: (6060) Camping Municipal d'Idanha-a-Nova
description: The Municipal Camping Idanha-a-Nova is intended for the practice of camping and caravanning under the conditions established in the internal regulations and other applicable legislation that is available for consultation at the reception. Inserted in a region of the odd wealth range, either by the historic villages of Idanha-a-Velha (ancient Egitânia) and Monsanto, or by the landscaping beauty, by the cultural values, as well as by the preservation of sites that were important in the history of Lusitania. The Camping Park has been the target of a process of recovery and requalification since 2015 that today begins to gain visibility. We count on your visit and thank you for your preference.

title: (6150-737) Sobreira Formosa - 1 Estrada da Póvoa
description: Large parking lot with lighting. Next to the market.

title: (6060) Idanha a Nova - Unnamed Road
description: Amazingly quiet and beautiful lake. Many places to park around here. The water level has been low, so on the map we're in the lake. Drive past the caravan park and choose a spot to your liking.

name: Alpedrinha, Largo de Santo António.
title: (6230) Alpedrinha, Largo de Santo António.
description: Free public flat P convenient for vehicles up to 7m, illuminated, inside nice historic village and 75m away from N 18 road, providing quiet night. Good starting point for monuments and hiking. Nice sun rising. Toilets are at lower level.

title: (6230-066) Alpedrinha - Rua da Estação
description: Free public P, unleveled (!) without parking lines on larger side and in line along municipal road (low night traffic). Near nice historic village center. It is good place for one night but look for the other.

title: (6050) - N18
description: Small pic nick area, but with a very clean and fresh fountain with water

name: Quinta da Bela Pedra
title: (6230) Quinta da Bela Pedra
description: Park your van in a Beautiful, peaceful ancient olive grove on an off grid kunekune pig farm halfway between Fundao and Castelo Branco. Great views, perfect place to park up while you look for your dream property in the area or explore the natural surroundings of Central Portugal. No ablution facilities on site but fresh water available from the nearby town spring.  Height restriction 3m and no big motor homes. Camper vans up to 6m. WhatsApp or call to check availability. email

title: (6230) - Caminho da Casa do Guarda
description: Top of Gardunha mountain, it is also called “Mountain Guard House”. Very nice with big trees and a lot of hike places, bike btt is also very good. Good place to sleep, but I saw no services! The road is not big and big vans will have some difficulty to reach here. But van till 6m it is excellent.

title: (6230) Alpedrinha - N18
description: Free flat gravel P behind chapel, aside N 18 road but on a little higher level. Alternative if two suggested places in Alpedrinha village are not available. Swimming pool open in Summer. Good point to sun rising watch.

title: (10510) Santiago de Alcántara - CC-37
description: A small shady road ledge. We stopped for lunch but barely a car passed in 3 hours. It could be a good place to spend the night. You cannot camp.

title: (6230) Alpedrinha - N18
description: Fresh water fountain very old (1873) and well known by locals, even on N 18 road, together with one stone picnic table and seats and extended panorama over planes Southern of Gardunha mountain. Not convenient to fill motorhome tank. Traveling S to N, 100m ahead you can reverse.

title: (6050) Sao Simao - EM526
description: Park without gradient next to secondary road (with little movement), possível overnight. With WC.

title: (6230-781) Vale de Prazeres - Rua central N9A Catrão
title_short: (6230-781) Vale de Prazeres - Rua central N9A Catrão
description: Quiet and safe private place, in a farm, surrounded by fruit trees, in a small village called Catrão. there is a bar which also does a grocery store 200 meters away, and another less than 700 meters away. The city (Fundao) is 25 minutes away. There is a river beach 20 minutes away. Access to the land by a small path, vehicles maximum 6 meters. Please call me by phone or WhatsApp, but I could only answer you by WhatsApp.

title: (6185) Orvalho -
description:
Small place near a hike way.
ideal to one or two night

name: Monte da Pia Camping
title: (6230) Monte da Pia Camping
description:
Please note. I can not listen to voice messages or call you back if I miss your call.
Please send a text using WhatsApp, Signal or on Google maps for a speedy response. 

Small farm with shady olives, orange trees, goats, chickens and other farmyard animals. Hook-ups for campers and a small number of  secluded spots for tents.

5 minutes off tarmac and good access for articulated vehicles from the west.

Private property no guest without permission. 

There is wild swimming on site and we are 20 minutes from a lovely river.  The local village has a great bakery, small general stores and bars. Please ring ahead to check availability. 

See us on Google maps.

There is a restaurant in vale da Prazeres. If you would prefer to eat in Corticada please book 1 day in advance.

2 corner shops 5 mins
Supermarkets 25 minute drive

Campers on foot can walk from the station

title: (6185) Orvalho -
description: A small place to rest one night. access only 4x4, probably in the winter, will be a little slippery.

title: (6230) Alcongosta - 24 Rua dos Candais
description: Free park  for all kind of vans. Ideal for visitting cherries house museum and the village of Alcongosta. In the village are cafes and MB.

title: (6160) Oleiros - N351
description: Fountain and car park slightly set back from the road.

title: (6185) Orvalho - 6 Travessa Adro
description: Parking near the church

title: (6150) São Pedro Esteval - N351
description: Local picnic area with trash bins, drinking water and a sheltered barbecue area

name: Parque de Campismo do Fundão
title: () Parque de Campismo do Fundão
description: A good place In the convent park. Out of season. Many routes but without information. Correct reception

title: (6185) Orvalho - N238
description: Parking space for cars, although small vans can park here (there is no sign that says you are not allowed). Barbecue, tables in the shade and an amazing view of the surroundings. There are toilets with water tap and even toilet paper.

title: (6230) Fundão - 24 Rua do Registo
description: Park near city center, in summer swimming is possible inside the park that is in front. It has a dirty road that leaves from here inside the Gardunha mountain. It’s the beginning of a famous hike track and a lot of btt bike tracks end here. No services except garbage, but a cafe and a restaurant near. You a ATM in 5min on foot. Free park and big for all kind of vans. Nice view to Gardunha mountain.

title: (6230-215) Fundão - 11 Rua Cândido dos Reis
description: Laundry self-service, open every day till 22h.

title: (7320) Póvoas e Meadas - Unnamed Road
description: Small farm. Flat. Grass. Water, electricity. No other facilities. Nature, clean, no stench.

title: () Rosmaninhal - Unnamed Road
description: A small parking lot next to a very small chapel. In a beautiful location in the countryside. No service available.

title: (6185) Bogas de Baixo - N238
description: Beautiful viewpoint of the area, no services, just a nice stop.

title: (6230-350) Fundão - 33 Rua Loteamento Rebordão
description: Good place to park together the business center, the municipal garden, the library.

name: Camping Oleiros
title: (6160-301) Camping Oleiros
description: Awesome camping, very nice people, very clean and organized, the river beach is lesser then 50m from there. I recommend 100%

title: (6230-219) Fundão - 17 Rua de Haapsalu
description: Self-service Laundry pay by money or card. Wi-Fi available. All clean. Park around during week days and work time is difficult.

title: (6230) Bogas de Cima -
description:
Magnificent location next to a chapel.
Access is by a relatively steep hill but it passes in 2WD
The last turn on arrival is tight so avoid too long RVs.

Space for 2 or even 3 vehicles

Point of view continuing the path towards the antenna

title: (6230) Fundão - 33 Avenida Eugénio de Andrade
description: Laundry Self Service, has place to park a big van a little down the road.

title: (10511) Carbajo - 28 Calle los Jardines
description: Carbajo is a village of about 200 inhabitants, which on Magusto, the first day of the Celtic calendar, October 31 celebrates every year, making it one of the international Celtic - Folk festivals of greatest relevance in the autonomous community of Extremadura. On the foothills of the Sierra de San Pedro

title: (6230) Fundão - 117 Rua Fernando Pessoa
description: Public Green park. Calm at night. Central zone for walking in the old part of the city.

title: (6230) Fundão - 23 Rua Cidade da Covilhã
description: Fuel station with GPL and bottles gas, AdBlue, Diesel and Gasoline, also a great view of the mountain Serra da Estrela. It has water but pressure is not good, you can see the tires and go to the excellent bakery in front of the police. Good for a quick pitstop!

title: (6050) Nisa - 43 Estrada das Amoreiras
description: Park with water fountain and tables for outdoor meals.

name: camping Xisto
title: (3320-104) camping Xisto
description: Small Camping Park (Xisto camping) does not have nature in front of the river beach, very clean toilets, support bar, the only thing less than that there is no item to clear or chemical toilet (despite allowing clear houses of banho) e black waters. Ideal for who seeks tranquility.

title: (3320-104) Janeiro de Baixo - 8 Rua Santocristo
description: Classic parking along a beautiful picnic area equipped with barbecues, tables and benches in the shade, supervised sandy beach with shower, umbrellas and sunbathing, just that! The bathing water is very good and clean (blue flag). Nice little bar. Camping next door but have not tested. We had a very quiet and cool night, no problem. Starting point for many hikes.

title: (6060) Rosmaninhal - Unnamed Road
description: Quiet place, with picnic tables, shade.  Very beautiful

name: Posto de Turismo de Nisa
title: (6050-350) Posto de Turismo de Nisa
description: Flat and lighted free public park very close to the central garden and next to the tourist office and craft shops. Not suitable for vehicles over 6.5 m in length. Easy pedestrian access to the historic center.

title: (6050-327) Nisa - 38 Rua Doutor Sidónio Pais
description: Large paved parking lot. Without services. Busy street during the day. 20 minutes walk from the center of the medieval village.

title: (6060-041) Idanha-a-Nova - 34 Rua da Palma
description: Roman city dependent on Merida. Impressive epigraphic archive

title: (6185) Cambas - N112
description: Near the river, very quiet ?,  room for 2 or 3 motorhomes, public toilets nearby. fluvial beach nearby!!

title: (6050) Nisa - 19 Rua dos Lusíadas
description: Launderette open from 08:00 to 22:00

title: (6050) Nisa - 3 Rua dos Lusíadas
description: Asphalt and quiet free public P, located just opposite the Intermarché supermarket (also has cafeteria) inside small town of Nisa. No sign prohibiting parking. It's pretty but very noisy due to shopping users after 08:30. This P is not charming; there is another behind NW that is quieter.

title: (6230) - Rua da Argemela
description: One of the best river swimming pools in the area. Free barbecue and free toilets. Park with grass and good facilities. All free except from bar/restaurant. Excelent for the summer. Swimming is possible from  mid June to mid September on summer holidays. Picnic area is good.

title: (6185) - N112
description: Nice small beach. Possible to park though it’s not properly for that. Spend one night here and was beautiful in the morning. Very quiet place. Small tap where you can drink water. It’s possible to park for night if you ask the local council,

title: (6150-544) Proença-a-Nova - 5 Rua do Heliporto
description: Free Intermarché service area. 2 places.

title: (6030) - Autoestrada da Beira Interior
description: Rest area is the main Highway (Motorway), A23, it has free water has air for check pressure in tires. Very clean bathroom, and good breakfast, with local products. Fill your tank of fuel and water (free and large flow). It has gas pump and bottles. Very good stop!

title: (6060) Zebreira - N332
description: Huge parking day and night. Good for a pose where even at night. Quiet

title: (6060) Zebreira -
description: Space near a dam, calm and peaceful lake, no sign prohibiting sleeping or stopping. Please keep the space clean and do your part of Colibrí.

title: (6230-346) Fundão - 30 Rua Cidade da Covilhã
description: Laundry in the Intermarche hypermarket parking lot.

title: (6230) Aldeia Nova do Cabo -
description:
Calm and pleasant place, with lots of space. good for those who like to watch birds as there are many species in the riverside area. you can go for a walk or cycling and enjoy the scenery. 
City of Fundão ​​5 min by car and 30 min walking, village of Telhado and Aldeia de Joanes 15 min walk with mini market, coffee shop and ATM,restaurants. Fantastic river beaches in the area. Everything you need on a short distance. It's possible to share the electricity from the house if you have the electric extensions. 

Gate is always open, park where you want and I will be with you as soon as possible. Thanks

title: (6160) Oleiros - Rua Doutor Barata Relvas
description: Service station near a small hospital (clinic).

title: (6150-519) Proença-a-Nova - 30 Largo da Devesa
description: Picnic tables in the middle of town, with shade and well-kept bathrooms.

title: (6060) Zebreira -
description: Lake with few people even in summer. It is not at level. The GNR warned us that overnight stays were prohibited.

title: (6230) Valverde - 9 Estrada Municipal
description: Car park on the outskirts of the village. Beautiful views. Prefect for a nights stop. Safe with street lights. Very quiet nights sleep. No facilities, except bins.

title: (6230) Fundão - 6 N18
description: Fuel station (new) Repsol, with GPL, fresh bread in Lidl (in front) or Continente Supermarket (next), has BricoMarche also in front. In the beginning of bike tracks in and of the city.

name: Casa Na Floresta
title: (6230-180) Casa Na Floresta
description:
A peaceful and lovely campsite. If you are looking for a place to chill and be surrounded with nature this is the place. There is a place for one or two campers up to 7m. Easy access and flat. The toilets and showers are 100m walk nice and clean. there is a fully featured kitchen with everything you need to prepare a hot meal. a washing machine is here as well.
important! Please contact before showing up :)

title: (6060-051) - 19 Avenida Medina
description: Medelim - Municipality of Idanha-a-Nova Next to the Sanctuary of the Lord of Calvary Village with numerous Judaic vestiges.

title: (6230) Barroca - 2 Rua 5 de Outubro
description:
Nice natural spot to stay a night near the Zêzere river.In Summer its possible to rent a kayak and  a small bar its Open but closes at 23h .
 Access by the midle of the vilage and only to a small/médium motorhome.

name: Parque de autocaravanas Albufeira de Póvoa e Meadas
title: (7320) Parque de autocaravanas Albufeira de Póvoa e Meadas
title_short: (7320) Parque de autocaravanas Albufeira de Póvoa e Meadas
description: Pitch renewed at the end of 2022, with full camper service. Access via barrier where you have to register on the Outdoor site which requires a lot of personal data and takes a few minutes; payment by card. View over the dam of Póvoa e Meadas. Toilet block with cold showers. Nice, quiet and clean. Beautiful walking routes, wonderful cycling and a refreshing lake for swimming.

title: (6185) Janeiro de Cima - Rua do Rio
title_short: (6185) Janeiro de Cima - Rua do Rio
description: Quiet parking, able to spend the night. Has a small playground for children and a place to swim, there’s also a place to barbecue and picnic tables

title: (7320) - EM1007
description:
Pleasant to park on site, near Póvoa e Meadas dam, accessible for swimming. It has a picnic area and a public grill, with a sink and running water. To be used only during daylight. 
NOTE: it is FORBIDDEN to overnight because this area integrates natural park (Parque Natural da Serra de São Mamede) where it is forbidden to overnight out of authorized places.

title: (6230) Fundão - Rua Sítio da Areeira
description: Wash your caravan here, the best around the area, has good pressure and good price. Very good view over the mountain. The owner speaks very well French (he lived there). Water in the fuel station (good pressure). You can sleep in the park of supermarket. ATM in the supermarket. Everything here is very calm. Supermarket has fuel to.

title: (6150) Proença-a-Nova -
description: Small parking lot, could spend the night there completely relaxed, including a 10m team. You can hardly hear the road above, the adjacent road is hardly used even in August.

title: (6150) - Unnamed Road
description: Top off the mountain, not easy access but very nice view.Ad a table and a tree.Very nice to see the Sunrise.

title: (7320) Barragem de Nisa -
description: Shortly before the dam, a small path that leads to a site with benches. But by following the lake on the small path, you will come across THE little nugget. Shaded with access to sunny parts, tranquility assured, birdsong, otters, swimming in the lake possible, highly recommended. There is another location after the dam which gives access to drinking water, and has garbage cans. Please leave this place clean!

title: (6060) Monsanto -
description: Offgrid farm with stunning views of beautiful Monsanto(10km)! The natural pool of Penha Garcia (18km) offers shady picnic areas, a reservoir with a river leading to the pool, fossils, an ancient mill, a castle with spectacular views of the valley. Both sights can also be reached via hiking trails. In the beautiful nature, rare species of birds can be seen. Access is possible for campers up to 8.50 m. We speak English, Portuguese, Italian and German. Please always contact us beforehand.

title: (6100) Relvas - EM538
description: Excellent drinking water about 100 m before the pass. Tables and benches invite you to linger. no shadow. max space for 2 mobile homes. Mobile communications satisfactory...good at the top of the pass

title: (3320) - Unnamed Road
description: Very nice and quiet place. only 4x4 access dirt road.

title: (6150) Vale Água -
description: Nice and easy access tap next to the road. Good water pressure.

title: (6100) Vilões -
description:
Totally off grid, off road area. If you enjoy peace and solitude, you will love this area in the mountains. I would guess nobody has driven these tracks for weeks or months because i had to clear fallen burnt trees out of the way the get my MH thru.

Ensure you take a saw with you to clear your way.

title: (6120) - Unnamed Road
description: Wonderful place at a small waterfall. Access not easy! Rather 4x4! There is also a source of drinking water! Absolute peace! Google maps: Pego da Rainha

title: (7320) Barragem de Nisa - EM1007
description: Nice and nice place with the water next. Nickel for the night and the ground is flat. Just there is a little noise from the factory a little before. Beware a lot of otter family.

title: (6225) Casegas -
description: Quiet night next to a beautiful river where you can swim during the day. No services. Just you and nature.

title: (6120) Vale Grou -
description: Place pour dormir avec une vue incroyable, compliqué de monté en camping car.

title: (7320) Barragem de Nisa -
description:
A nice and quiet place next to a clean lake. only two other vans were parked here. the road is accessible!
only park here if you are a nature lover and have your own toilet. respect nature and keep it clean! enjoy!

title: (6160) Mosteiro - Unnamed Road
description: Water source with very good water, no hose connection.

title: (6050) Amieira do Tejo -
description: Small quiet place to spend the night by the water under the eucaliptos

name: Barragem de Fratel - IP 2
title: (6030) Barragem de Fratel - IP 2
description: Free flat P on Northern top of Fratel dam, Tejo river, without shadows. Perfect for a lunch stop! Nice views, path for walk.

title: (6060-091) Monsanto - 2 Rua da Laginha
description: Small picnic area with two tables and a water point. It is on the way to the mountain village of Monsanto.

title: (6060) Monsanto -
description: Follow the sign capella San Pedro de Vira Corca at the end of the dead end (tarmac road til the end, no problem with a over 7m with over cab), a large flat surface to park by the little chapel and enjoy a gorgeous scenery of massive granite boulders. Climbing to Monsanto village by beautiful footpaths is 1km and there are many more to explore.

title: (6050) Amieira do Tejo - Access to Barca da Amieira Trail
title_short: (6050) Amieira do Tejo - Access to Barca da Amieira Trail
description: Flat asphalt area (it was used for Fratel dam construction mobile residence) on isolation ambience at evening and night. Good place to overnight, very quiet and safe besides no lightning. Just a couple of trains during the night on opposite Tejo riverside. 5 min away from IP 2, near Fratel dam, so perfect if you are travelling. Very good to watch stars when no moonlight.

address.street: Access to Barca da Amieira Trail

title: (6050) Amieira do Tejo - Trilho da Barca da Amieira - E top
title_short: (6050) Amieira do Tejo - Trilho da Barca da Amieira - E top
description:
Beautiful little free P in the hills just on left Tejo riverside, totally quiet. Spectacular view of the nearby dam and some fun hiking paths with art installations in nature. Very easy access on tarnac road. No services, no water. 
For vans up to 6m max (due to marks on floor of P), so not convenient for big motorhomes.

address.street: Trilho da Barca da Amieira - E top

title: (6090-049) Águas - 18 Rua Governador Luís da C. Barreto
title_short: (6090-049) Águas - 18 Rua Governador Luís da C. Barreto
description: Fresh spring water, is also used as drinking water by locals. Very refreshing! Enjoy your meal

address.street: 18 Rua Governador Luís da C. Barreto

title: (6060) Monsanto - 2 Beco do Forno
description: A large parking lot that allows you to spend the night. It has public toilets for the day, a fountain and dining tables. It is in the town of Relva. Ideal for visiting Monsanto. To thank the locality of Relva for welcoming the CCs and vans with pleasure. Accessible by truck from Medelim.

title: (6060-091) Monsanto - 11 Avenida Fernando Ramos Rocha
description: Ideal parking for visiting Monsanto. pretty flat. We arrived at 10pm and it was pretty empty. There is free WC, clean but without a lid on the toilets, a few meters up the hill. There are no signs prohibiting night or day parking. We took a nice walk through the town, at night.

title: (6230) - IP2
description: Rest area in highway A23, near Fundão, Diesel, Gas (GPL and bottle) Water. A lot of tradicional artifacts and traditional food. Good coffe! Quiet to sleep one night.

name: Parque Campismo Aldeia Ruiva
title: (6150) Parque Campismo Aldeia Ruiva
description:
"Parque Campismo Aldeia Ruiva"
Small camping with separate áreas for motorhomes, tents and bungalows, with dirty wathears under construction and near river beach.

title: (6060-088) Monsanto - 7A Avenida Heróis do Ultramar
description: Esplanade in barren countryside with views of Monsanto (1.5 km). Along a quiet road at night. Bar 50 meters. Starting point for Monsanto. The GNR sends the ACs here. Close to plaza with bus to Monsanto.

title: (6215-768) Coutada - 3 Rua da Independência
description:
We have 5 parking spots on a beautiful permaculture farm with olive trees, sheep and chickens.

The whole land is fenced with walls and trees so you'll be safe. We have a simple compost toilet on the campsite and the shower is in the main house. 
Because we recycle our waste water we ask you to only use biodegradable soaps (you can borrow ours). 
The parking spots are nearly level so with blocks under the wheels you'll get a good result.

You're welcome to have a look around, learn about permaculture or perhaps get some fresh eggs in the morning from our free range rescue chickens.

Dogs are not allowed! Our chickens run free and there have been problems even with otherwise very friendly dogs.

The days can get hot in the summer, but the mountain provides cool air and it's still nice and chilly at night for you to sleep well, even in the middle of summer.

We ask a contribution per night that will go straight to planting more tees or other things to give back to the land :)

The area:
- Bakery, village store - 2 min walk
- River for swimming - 5 min walk
- Hiking - 10 min
- Cascades - 15 min drive
- Serra da Estrela Nature Park - 1 hour drive

title: (6120) - Estradão Praia Fluvial (Ponte Asseiceira)
description: River Praia of Carvoeira. Nice river pools in a very beautiful natural environment. Parking on a slight slope. There is a bar, bathrooms and covered area with tables and grills with sink.

title: (3320) Pampilhosa da Serra - Avenida José Nunes Júnior
title_short: (3320) Pampilhosa da Serra - Avenida José Nunes Júnior
description: You can refill water here at a public fountain.

title: (3320) CASAL DA LAPA - N344
description: Mixed use parking. hard surface, level, free. Views to lake through trees. Quiet. Access to excellent, well maintained, hot showers (50 cents) and toilets. Designed for cycling, rock rock climbing, skate boarding, kayaking, swimming and walking access. Stunning locality near spectacular dam. No other services. Easy access: we are 9.23m length and 3.4 height, 7.5 tonnes. Restaurant nearby.

title: (6230) Alcaria - 2 Rua da Nossa Senhora das Necessidades
title_short: (6230) Alcaria - 2 Rua da Nossa Senhora das Necessidades
description: Good park next to the river, with playground, calm at night, with swimming in summer.

address.street: 2 Rua da Nossa Senhora das Necessidades

name: Cumeada da Ponte
title: (7320-419) Cumeada da Ponte
description: Quinta Alto da Cumeada is a private rural farm that lets stay overnight. Really under the stars; seeing the farm animals (possible to buy products). Owners are very friendly and speak other languages. It is just 10 min from Castelo de Vide. Convenient call before arrive.

title: (7330-012) Beirã - 1 Largo da Alfândega
description: Free parking at Marvao Beira station, abandoned historic station, quiet place. Interesting to discover and do a "bike on rails" activity where you can pedal on the rails.

title: (3320) - Unnamed Road
description: Perfect place to spend the night in the middle of nature with easy access, a bit of a slope rather for camper. crystal clear water site.

title: (6225-119) Casegas - 1 Rua da Quelhinha
description: Picnic area, with 5 tables and swimming zona in the river.

title: (3320) Vidual - Rua Santa Bárbara
description: Secluded place by the lake. Quiet, good, spectacular access also for large mobile homes. Super water without chemicals. No service, just nice.

title: (6215) Paul - 76 Estrada do Santuário
description: Great area called Santuario (religion place). Calm and quite place. Good to park day and night. To do a picnic with a barbecue. And wc.

name: CAMPING ENVENDOS
title: (6120) CAMPING ENVENDOS
description: Location 10 x 10 m approx. Field surrounded and we live on the spot. Warning !! There is no electricity, sanitation or emptying. You can have the services electricity and emptying free to 5 km. located in a very quiet place. In the heart of the mountains, village within 500 m. Climbing, fishing, ideal hiking. Grocery, bar, tobacco, restaurant. Free swimming pool nearby at 100 m Baker passing on the ground If you like the peace it is by here!

title: (6225) - CM1374
description: Looks like a picnic area or gathering place during a party or ceremony (monument dedicated to minors). Very quiet and shady corner. We had a quiet night.
